name: The Loom Art
project_history: Campaign shoot for new collection 'Woven Dreams'
Behind-the-scenes video of artisans at work
notes_and_history: Loves talent who understand the nuances of handloom fabrics and can capture the texture and story. Prefers natural lighting.

name: Zepto
project_history: Ad campaign for 10-minute delivery service
Social media content for new product launches
notes_and_history: Always on a tight deadline. Appreciates quick turnarounds and data-backed creative suggestions.
attachments_docs_provided: Yes, detailed briefs with performance metrics

name: David Chen
project_history: Animated loop for NFT drop
Concept art for a personal short film
notes_and_history: Communicates in feelings and abstract concepts. Hates phone calls. Needs a creative who can interpret his vision with minimal hand-holding.

name: Ministry of Tourism, Government of India

project_behavior.average_scope: Full team for large scale campaigns

talent_preferences.preferred_portfolio_format: Formal company profile and project proposals

project_history: Incredible India 3.0 campaign video
Photography for 'Dekho Apna Desh' initiative
notes_and_history: Requires multiple rounds of approvals from various departments. Adherence to protocol is paramount. Payment cycles are notoriously long (90+ days).

name: Subko Coffee Roasters
project_history: Product photography for new single-origin coffee launch
Instagram Reels series on brewing methods
notes_and_history: Very particular about capturing the 'Subko aesthetic' - grainy textures, warm tones, and a sense of place. Loves analog film photographers.

name: GrowthX

talent_preferences.preferred_portfolio_format: Google Drive link, past work samples

project_history: Editing weekly YouTube podcast episodes
Creating carousels for Instagram from blog posts
notes_and_history: Needs editors who understand fast-paced, engaging, retention-focused editing for social media. Quick turnarounds are critical. Uses lots of pop-culture references.
attachments_docs_provided: Yes, provides raw footage and asset folders

name: WeWork India
project_history: Launch campaign for new building in Koramangala, Bangalore
Member testimonial video series
notes_and_history: Needs creatives who are experienced in architectural and interior photography. All content must adhere to strict global brand guidelines.

name: Aparna Verma & Sameer Sharma Wedding

budgeting.approach: Fixed, but with some flexibility for add-ons

project_history: 3-day destination wedding coverage in Udaipur
notes_and_history: High-maintenance client who needs a lot of reassurance. Very focused on getting specific shots from their Pinterest board. Key is to manage expectations on what's possible.

name: Schbang

project_behavior.type_of_briefs_shared: Client briefs forwarded with agency inputs
project_behavior.average_scope: Varies (single editor to full production unit)

budgeting.approach: Varies per client, often looks for value deals

project_history: Ad film production for a large FMCG client
Quick-turnaround reel editing for a fashion brand
Product photoshoot for a D2C startup
notes_and_history: Acts as a middleman, so communication can sometimes be disjointed. Expects fast turnarounds and is known for negotiating hard on price. Good for volume work.
past_feedback: Mixed - good for business, but can be chaotic

name: Ritviz

project_behavior.type_of_briefs_shared: Music track and a core idea
project_behavior.average_scope: Full video production team, VJ, tour photographer

project_history: Music video for his new single
Tour photographer for his US tour
Visuals (VJ) for his NH7 Weekender set
notes_and_history: The manager handles all the logistics, but Ritviz himself is heavily involved in the creative direction. Looks for directors and DoPs who can translate his sound into a unique visual language.

name: Notion
project_history: Creating a set of custom illustrations for a new feature launch
Building a comprehensive 'Content Creator OS' template for Notion
notes_and_history: The team is full of product and design thinkers. They appreciate creatives who are also power users of Notion. The bar for quality is exceptionally high. All communication happens within Notion.

name: The Bombay Canteen
project_history: Menu photoshoot for the new 'Canteen Winter' menu
Videography for the 'Independence Day Daawat' event
notes_and_history: Needs food photographers who can shoot in a natural, un-staged, yet beautiful way. They are all about the story behind the ingredients and the dish.

name: Ultrahuman
project_history: Launch video for the Ultrahuman Ring AIR
Lifestyle shoot showing users interacting with the app and device
notes_and_history: Needs creatives who can understand and visualize complex health data in a simple, aspirational way. Think Apple-level product marketing.

name: The Juggernaut

talent_preferences.location_of_talent: Global, preference for South Asian artists

project_history: Editorial illustration for a long-form story on diaspora identity
Photo research and licensing for a historical piece
notes_and_history: Looking for illustrators with a strong conceptual style who can read a complex story and create a compelling, non-literal visual. Respectful of creative interpretation.
attachments_docs_provided: Yes, article text in Google Docs

name: Rohan Arora

budgeting.approach: Flexible, pays for speed and quality

project_history: Professional headshots for LinkedIn and conference bios
Cleaning up a pitch deck design overnight
notes_and_history: Super last-minute requests. Example: 'Need a photographer for a 9am headshot tomorrow. Let me know who you have.' Willing to pay a premium for reliability and un-prompted professionalism. Hates back-and-forth.

name: Tata Cliq Luxury

project_behavior.type_of_briefs_shared: Detailed campaign briefs and brand guidelines
project_behavior.average_scope: Full production team for digital campaigns

project_history: Digital film for 'The Watch Society'
Photoshoot for the 'Indian Luxury' edit
Stylist for an influencer-led campaign
notes_and_history: Expects extremely high production quality. Deep understanding of the luxury consumer is a must. Prefers talent who have worked with international luxury brands before.
attachments_docs_provided: Yes, very detailed briefs and brand books

name: The Good Food Institute India
project_history: Animated explainer video on cellular agriculture
Designing the annual 'State of the Industry' report
Event photography for the Smart Protein Summit
notes_and_history: Looks for creatives who are genuinely interested in their mission of promoting alternative proteins. Needs talent who can distill complex scientific information into accessible and engaging content.
attachments_docs_provided: Yes, detailed briefs with research links

name: Oura

project_behavior.average_scope: Full production team for lifestyle shoots

project_history: Lifestyle photoshoot featuring diverse users in their daily routines
Social media video campaign on the science of sleep
notes_and_history: Needs creatives who can capture authentic, non-cheesy moments of wellness and health. High premium on talent who live the brand ethos. Casting is extremely important to them.
attachments_docs_provided: Yes, detailed briefs and asset libraries

name: Chirag Malhotra

project_behavior.type_of_briefs_shared: WhatsApp voice note with a property address

budgeting.approach: Fixed per property, tries to negotiate

project_history: Weekly walkthrough videos of luxury apartments in Gurgaon
Drone footage of farmhouses in Chattarpur
notes_and_history: The 'quirky' client. Briefs are exclusively 2-minute long voice notes sent at random hours. Needs a videographer who can take these minimal instructions and produce a polished property tour video within 48 hours. Always pays on time.

name: Fable & Mane
project_history: Campaign shoot for new MahaMane Smooth & Shine Hair Oil
Behind-the-scenes content from ingredient sourcing trips in India
notes_and_history: Deeply connected to the brand's Indian roots. Looks for creatives who can authentically capture the blend of ancient rituals and modern luxury. Prefers working with talent of South Asian origin.

name: CRED

project_behavior.type_of_briefs_shared: A single sentence idea from Kunal

project_history: IPL ad campaign featuring 90s celebrities
CRED store product intro videos
notes_and_history: Famously high standards and cryptic briefs. The creative team needs to be able to take a nugget of an idea and build a world around it. Absolute creative freedom is given to the right team. Highly sought-after client.

name: Brex
project_history: Creating social media ad variations from a master file
Editing customer testimonial videos
Designing one-pagers and ebooks
notes_and_history: Very process-driven client. Needs creatives who can work within established brand templates and deliver quickly. Not a lot of creative freedom, but provides a steady stream of work. Ideal for efficient freelancers.

name: Ahilya by the Sea

project_behavior.type_of_briefs_shared: Phone call and a follow-up email

project_history: Lifestyle and architectural shoot for the hotel's website refresh
Content for a feature in Conde Nast Traveller
notes_and_history: The property is the hero. They need a photographer who understands light and shadow and can capture the soul of the place. No hard-sell marketing, just pure, quiet elegance. The owner has a very refined taste.

name: Paytm
project_history: Digital ad for UPI Lite feature
Explainer videos for merchants
Photography for 'Paytm Karo' hoardings
notes_and_history: A very typical large corporate client. Expect multiple layers of approval, a focus on cost-saving, and adherence to strict brand guidelines. Briefs can be very prescriptive. Good for consistent, large-scale work.
attachments_docs_provided: Yes, detailed briefs and brand books

name: Sarah Guo / Conviction
project_history: Designing charts and graphics for AI-related blog posts
Creating a keynote presentation template for an upcoming talk
notes_and_history: Needs a designer who can think like a VC. The ability to visualize complex data and market maps is key. High autonomy is given; the designer is expected to read the post and propose visuals, not wait for instructions.

name: Paper Boat
project_history: Animated short film for Diwali
Series of illustrations for their 'Memories' content series
notes_and_history: A dream client for storytellers. They look for creatives who can connect with the brand's core emotion of nostalgia and childhood memories. Very collaborative and respectful of the creative process.

name: Mehta & Sons Jewelers

budgeting.approach: Fixed, looks for a good deal

project_history: Product photography of their new diamond collection for the website
notes_and_history: A traditional, family-run business owner who is new to digital marketing. Needs a patient photographer who can guide him through the process. Very focused on getting clean, high-quality images for his catalog.

name: Lenskart

project_behavior.type_of_briefs_shared: Spreadsheet with SKUs and ad concepts

talent_preferences.preferred_portfolio_format: Drive link with past ad creatives

project_history: Creating 50 variations of a Facebook ad for a 'Buy 1 Get 1' offer
Designing banners for the mobile app
notes_and_history: Needs designers who are extremely fast with tools like Canva or Figma and can churn out a high volume of ad creatives based on templates. The focus is 100% on performance metrics, not creative awards.

name: Kriti Sharma Yoga
project_history: Photoshoot for her new website and Instagram page
Short video for her online yoga course
notes_and_history: A client with a very small budget, but offers a great opportunity for a new photographer to build their portfolio. Sometimes offers accommodation/yoga classes as part of the payment. Looking for someone who connects with her vibe.

name: Studio Dumbar

project_behavior.average_scope: Freelance Motion Designer, Specialist Type Designer

project_history: Collaboration with a motion designer for a dynamic identity project
Commissioning a custom typeface for a client
notes_and_history: An iconic design studio. They don't outsource full projects, but collaborate with freelance specialists who are at the top of their game. Getting a project with them is a huge validation for any designer.

name: Nithin Kamath (Zerodha/Rainmatter)
project_history: Documentary photographer for a Rainmatter Foundation project on ecology
Illustrations for a personal blog post about health and fitness
notes_and_history: Projects are often for his non-profit foundation or personal blog, focusing on health, climate, and wellness. Seeks authentic storytellers, not slick marketers. Communication is minimal and to the point.

name: GOAT

project_behavior.average_scope: Full team for editorial shoots (Photo, Video, Stylist)

project_history: Editorial shoot for a rare sneaker release
Video series featuring emerging artists and their sneaker collections
notes_and_history: Needs talent that is deeply embedded in sneaker and streetwear culture. Authenticity is non-negotiable. They hate anything that looks like a generic ad. Looks for photographers/directors with a strong, unique point of view.

name: Acko General Insurance

project_behavior.average_scope: Digital ad film teams, social media content creators

project_history: Digital ad campaign featuring popular comedians
Series of 'myth-busting' insurance videos for YouTube
notes_and_history: Known for their witty and humorous marketing. They look for writers and directors who can make a 'boring' topic like insurance engaging and funny for a young audience. They move fast and are decisive.
attachments_docs_provided: Yes, but they are open to ideas

name: Alo Yoga
project_history: Photoshoot with a major yoga influencer for a new collection launch
Event photography for a store opening in SoHo
notes_and_history: Often facilitates shoots for their network of influencers. Needs photographers who are excellent at making talent feel comfortable and can capture the 'Alo glow'. Fast-paced and always on-trend.

name: Chennai Super Kings

talent_preferences.experience_level: Mid-level, but fast and skilled in sports
talent_preferences.location_of_talent: Chennai / willing to travel with team

project_history: Creating match-day reels for Instagram
Behind-the-scenes video content from team practice sessions
Designing player-focused graphics for social media
notes_and_history: Needs a content team that can live and breathe with the team during the IPL season. The ability to capture the emotion of the fans and players is critical. Extremely fast-paced and demanding environment.
attachments_docs_provided: No, briefs are verbal or via text

name: Ritu Kumar
project_history: Bridal couture campaign shoot
Lookbook photography for a new pret collection
notes_and_history: An iconic brand with a very established aesthetic. They need creatives who understand the legacy of the brand and can produce timeless, elegant imagery. Not a client for experimental or edgy styles.
attachments_docs_provided: Yes, brand books and detailed briefs

name: Shopify

talent_preferences.location_of_talent: Various cities in India (for merchant stories)

project_history: Video testimonial of a successful Shopify merchant based in Jaipur
Photoshoot of a merchant's workshop and products in Mumbai
notes_and_history: Needs reliable creative teams across India who can be deployed to shoot merchant success stories. The style is authentic and founder-focused, not overly polished. Need to be good at making real people comfortable on camera.

name: a16z Crypto

talent_preferences.preferred_portfolio_format: Website, with examples of data viz

project_history: Creating animated explainers for complex crypto concepts
Designing infographics for the 'State of Crypto' report
notes_and_history: Needs creatives who are deeply knowledgeable about the crypto space and can create visuals that are both technically accurate and easy to understand. This is not a job for a generalist designer.

name: Unacademy

talent_preferences.preferred_portfolio_format: Instagram page (to show speed with trends)

project_history: Editing student testimonial reels
Creating topical memes related to exams and student life
notes_and_history: Their social media team is always trying to jump on the latest trend. They need creatives who are chronically online and can produce relevant content within hours. High pressure but also high volume of work.

name: Forest Essentials
project_history: Brand film shot in the Himalayas
Still life product photography with a focus on ingredients
notes_and_history: The gold standard for luxury Ayurveda. The creative bar is exceptionally high. They seek artists, not just technicians. A deep appreciation for Indian aesthetics and the philosophy of Ayurveda is a must.

name: Zomato

talent_preferences.experience_level: Mid-level, with a great sense of humor

project_history: Topical graphic on a trending news event
Short animation for a new feature announcement
notes_and_history: Famous for their witty, moment-marketing genius. Needs creatives who are quick on their feet, understand internet culture, and have a genuinely good sense of humor. The ability to turn around quality work in a few hours is key.

name: Ramp
project_history: Building out a library of marketing site components in Figma
Animating product UI for a launch video
notes_and_history: Very sophisticated design team. They need freelancers who can seamlessly integrate into their existing workflows and design systems in Figma. Not looking for new creative direction, but for skilled hands to execute an existing vision.

name: Good Earth
project_history: Campaign film for the annual 'Van Vasi' collection
Lookbook and still life photography for their home decor range
notes_and_history: A client that is a tastemaker in Indian design. They seek true artists who can capture the whimsical and soulful nature of their brand. Every project is a deep dive into Indian culture, craft, and nature.
attachments_docs_provided: Yes, rich concept notes and moodboards

name: The Athletic
project_history: On-field photographer for an NFL game
Portrait session with a premier league footballer for a feature story
notes_and_history: Needs top-quality sports photographers across the globe. They look for more than just action shots; they want photos that tell a story and capture the emotion behind the game. Reliability and professionalism are key.

name: Byju's
project_history: Editing recorded online classes
Adding motion graphics to educational videos
notes_and_history: A high-pressure, high-volume 'content factory' environment. They are constantly in need of editors and animators who can work fast and meet tight deadlines. It's a challenging environment, but offers a never-ending stream of work for those who can handle the pace.
past_feedback: Bad - high pressure, low pay, payment delays

name: Aman Resorts

budgeting.approach: Cost is not the primary object

project_history: Commissioning a fine-art photographer to capture the spirit of Aman-i-Khas
Creating a silent, meditative film about Amangiri
notes_and_history: The pinnacle of luxury hospitality. They don't hire 'commercial' talent; they commission artists. The work is about capturing a feeling, not selling a room. Projects are rare, prestigious, and creatively demanding.

name: Stripe

talent_preferences.experience_level: Expert in print and book design

project_history: Designing and typesetting a new book for Stripe Press
Commissioning a cover illustration from a well-known artist
notes_and_history: Stripe Press has incredibly high standards for book design, typography, and illustration. They work with the best in the field to create beautifully crafted physical books. A dream client for a print-focused designer.

name: Bira 91

project_behavior.average_scope: Full team for events, designers for merch

project_history: Designing new merchandise for their online store
Event photography and videography for the Bira 91 Free Flow fest
Illustrations for new beer packaging
notes_and_history: A brand that's heavily invested in culture, especially hip-hop, street art, and comedy. They look for creatives who are part of that culture and can bring an authentic voice. Lots of creative freedom on their merchandise and event-related projects.

name: Patagonia
project_history: Funding and distributing a documentary about a grassroots environmental movement in India
Hiring a local DoP for a shoot in the Andes
notes_and_history: Patagonia Provisions and Films department funds and supports documentaries about environmental activism. They look for authentic storytellers who are deeply embedded in the issues they're covering. It's less a client relationship and more a partnership or grant.
attachments_docs_provided: Yes, grant proposals and story outlines

name: Cure.fit / Cult.fit
project_history: Photography of new Cult center interiors
Editing user-generated content for social media ads
Shooting trainer-led workout videos
notes_and_history: A very fast-moving growth team. They are always running experiments and need creatives who can keep up. Needs photographers who can capture high-energy, sweaty, authentic fitness moments. No glossy, fake-looking stuff. Speed and reliability are valued over artistic perfection.
